attributes.action: Simple Action Now To Help UK Young People & Future Generations
attributes.additional_details:
Benefits of a solar Planning / Building Regulation & high FIT policy:
-	help meet UK climate change targets
-	high volumes reducing solar costs
-	low New Build installation costs 
-	site layout can maximise sun exposure
-	increased electric car sales with free charging at home
-	free home heating/lighting/technology
-	excess electricity back into the grid providing £energy rebate for the home owner
-	reduction instead of increase to future power station demand and their fossil fuel requirements
attributes.background: Regardless of whether humans or nature are responsible for climate change, we must reduce pollution, consumption of earth's resources, and energy cost. The government must require builders to incorporate solar (photovoltaic) roof tiles, or as a minimum solar panels, on all New Build homes.
